item.title: Raspberry Pi 4 - Ubuntu 20.04 w/Btrfs root
item.description: How to convert a root filesystem on a Raspberry Pi 4 b running Ubuntu 20.04 64 bit to Btrfs in a few simple steps. Why First, why should I care about doing this. Btrfs is SSD-aware, even on a SD card. The copy on write filesystem will ensure that your writes will be spread out and decrease wear leveling.
